https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rmo6102cLdrAHsxPi3CkLqaRulW.jpg Over four years of unprecedented access, the story of a brave group of black and Latino whistleblower cops and one unrelenting private investigator who, amidst a landmark lawsuit, risk everything to expose illegal quota practices and their impact on young minorities. Crime + Punishment
